content:
Pupil Context Interview Instructions:
Tell the child that the reading exercises are finished, and say "Thank you! Now I will ask you a few questions about yourself." Reminders:
  • Ask each question verbally to the child, as in an interview.
  • Do not read the response options aloud.
  • Wait for the child to respond, then indicate this response by touching the appropriate button on the screen.
  • If there is no special instruction to the contrary, only one response is permitted.
